content.description: This is a harder variation to "Free refills" that joins the route after the 6th bolt.   The crux is getting past the 3rd bolt.
content.protection: 6 bolt variation, then an additional 5 bolts to a chain anchor at the top of "Free Refills"
content.location: This is the second line of bolts on the South (left) side of the Parmacy.

content.description: First route on the left as you enter The Pharmacy. Limestonesque climbing to anchor in roof.
Two pitch route high up in the Pharmacy inside large chimney system. First pitch is trad 10b, second pitch is mixed 11a(mainly bolts)
content.protection: Standard to 3" and about 6 bolts. Bolted anchors.
content.location: On the north side of the pharmacy. There is a fixed line next to the route at ths time, and can be used for rapping.

content.description: Fun yet a bit sandy.  Get your script for HGH now because this route is pumpy almost right from the deck.
content.location:
Upper deck Pharmacy Area.  Located as the 3rd route on your left south wall as you enter the upper deck.   

  The route is north facing so it gets good shade.  Start is on a semi-arete just after a small cave/depression and just after a set of boulders at the base.   

  Once established on the opening moves, the route moves slightly right.

content.description: Climb up to an initial crack, then face climb on thin edges. The crux is getting past the 4th bolt.
content.location: This is the 4th route on the South (left) side of the pharmacy.

content.description: A very pumpy .10b, this climb is the perfect warm-up for the harder stuff, or a very challenging and well-protected route for the 5.10 climber. The crux is around the 4th bolt, and then again at the 11th bolt.
content.location: This is the second route on the South (left) side of the pharmacy, just past the steep patina face of Side Effects.Â

content.description: This area is at the top of the slot canyon. It is typically featured with stepped side-pulls, edges & sometimes sandy, honeycomb-like features on the left (south) side of the canyon.
